titleInfo.title: Country Music Spectacular at Muncie Field House (16914)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (navy and red on white) announcing the Country Music Spectacular featuring Jack Blanchard, Misty Morgan, T. G. Sheppard, the Country Cavalers, Clifford Flatford and the Flatlanders at the Muncie Field House in Muncie, Indiana on November 16. Poster features a metal photoplate of Jack Blanchard and Misty Morgan. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40225.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
